fundMediationReserve().details: called by MediationService when mediator does not perform (fails to commit or reveal)

registerMediator(address).details: use for MVP - admins add mediator addresses

fundMediationReserve().notice: reserve is used to pay additional mediators

pauseMediator().notice: mediator will no longer be drawn for mediation until reactivated

reactivateMediator().notice: mediator will be eligible for drawing again

reinstateMediator(address).notice: makes mediator eligible for drawing and allows them to withdraw their stake

stake().notice: add additional funds to stake to increase chances of being drawn for mediation

suspendMediator(address).notice: makes mediator ineligible for drawing and freezes their stake until reinstatement

withdrawStake(uint256).notice: withdraw deposited mediator stakesuspended mediators cannot withdraw stake
